about.title: About Me
about.point1: Hi, I'm Alexandre Émond — a backend-oriented full-stack developer passionate about clean architecture, system performance, and secure deployment.
about.point2: I work with C#/.NET, Java, PHP, Python, C++, and Bash, and build modern APIs (REST, GraphQL).
about.point3: I also have strong expertise in database development (SQL) and DevOps tools like Docker, GitHub Actions, and CI/CD workflows.
about.point4: Currently completing a 3-year Computer Science degree (GPA 99%). I also bring several years of practical technical experience from working in demanding industrial environments.
